snippet: About two dozen of the 35 elementary school students onboard were taken to Erlanger Hospital after the bus crashed about a mile from their school....

byline.original: By ALAN BLINDER and NIRAJ CHOKSHI
byline.contributor: Alan Blinder reported from Chattanooga, and Niraj Chokshi from New York.

lead_paragraph: About two dozen of the 35 elementary school students onboard were taken to Erlanger Hospital after the bus crashed about a mile from their school.

headline.main: At Least 5 Children Die in School Bus Crash in Chattanooga
